midasSelect.configuration.title: Midas Select
midasSelect.configuration.afterSelect.ma: Action after selecting a Markdown section (with header).
Action after selecting a Markdown section (content only).
midasSelect.configuration.afterSelect.br: Action after selecting content inside brackets.
Action after selecting content including brackets.
midasSelect.configuration.afterSelect.in: Action after selecting an indent block.
midasSelect.configuration.afterSelect.pa: Action after selecting a whole paragraph.
Action after selecting from cursor to the end of a paragraph.
midasSelect.configuration.afterSelect.no: Action when no specific block could be selected.
